Q_NAME: Print Date Of Birth of a Person
Q_DESC:
Write a java program to get the date of birth from the user and access it using class and objects
Mandatory
1.Create a new class named "Dob" apart form the main class(Testclass)
2.Create two methods namely read() and disp() inside the class Dob with no arguments of void type.
3.Create an object s in the main class and access two methods read() and disp() created under Dob class.
